The primary homework assignments in this course are lab assignments where you will use R and occassionally other software to acquire, explore, wrangle, and manage different
data sets. **Please submit a PDF (preferred) or HTML file along with your Rmarkdown file.** Be sure to answer all questions in lab, not just the *on your own section.* Labs should be submitted on Blackboard.
